result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. James T. Pelky

records.addlTxt: on Petition for Appointment of an Attorney

Court calls @ 2:18 PM 20CM18 & 22CM35. Defendant James T. Pelky in court.  Attorney Kelly Hays in court for State of Wisconsin, via zoom. Court reviews case history's. Def. has filed petition for appointment of Atty. back in July of 2022. Def. has received order appointing counsel in 20CM18 case and has paid $320 fee. Bond continues.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court calls @ 2:36 PM 22CM35 & 20CM18. Defendant James T. Pelky in court. Attorney Elizabeth R. Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin, via zoom. Court reviews case history. Def. has filed petition for appointment of atty. and Court questions if Def. has received letter granting petition. Def. confirms and is not yet up to date on atty. fees. State questions if court appointed Atty. is granted on both cases. Court confirms. Bond continues in both cases.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court calls 20cm18 & 22cm35 @ 2:55 PM, Defendant James T. Pelky in court.  Prosecuting attorney Kelly L Hays in court for the State of Wisconsin, via zoom. Court reviews case history on 22cm35. Court questions Def. on court appointed atty. payments. Def. responds and continues to wish for counsel.
Status conference scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court calls 20CM18 & 22CM35 @ 2:04 PM Defendant James T. Pelky in court.  Attorney Elizabeth R. Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin, via zoom.  Court reviews history of case.  AIA on 22CM35 & Status on 20CM18.  Court did grant court appointed atty.  Def. heard on down payment. Court gave until 9-1 to make payment. Bond continues.
Status conference scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court calls  20CM18 & 22CM35 @ 3:30 PM Defendant James T. Pelky in court.  Attorney Kelly Hays in court for State of Wisconsin. Def. has filed court appointed atty.  CC will need to reschedule.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
Court calls 22CM35 & 20CM18 @ 2:33 PM Defendant James T. Pelky in court.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin Kelly Hays in court. 20CM18 Status and 22CM35 AIA.  Def. is eligible for P.D. Def. needs to complete paperwork.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
No illegal use or possession of controlled substances.

Court calls 22CM35 & 20CM18@02:54 PM Defendant James T. Pelky in court.  Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin, via zoom. 22CM35   Def. has copy of complaint, advised of charges and penalties.  Def. given atty rights and given 3 options, PD, hire own or court appointed atty. Def. would like to try to get an attorney.  State gives bond recommendation. Def. heard on bond. Court gives 3 factors of setting bond & orders $50 cash bond.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
